conbody.p: The com.example.my-mmpdf plugin includes the following files and folders:

dd.p: Configuration file for the plugin which supports a new transformation type abc-mmpdf
Contains the dita2abc-mmpdf target, applied by the abc-mmpdf transformation type.
Top level stylesheet - do not edit
Language configuration file including a list of files containing localization strings
Miramo specific localization strings, supplied in addition to the standard DITA-OT localization strings (including those in pdf2)
Modify this file to add xsl stylesheet template match modifications; included by xsl/dita2miramo.xsl
Modify this file to add new variable definitions or document wide metadata. Included by cfg/xsl/custom.xsl
